title: I keep getting lag spikes randomly in game
body: Recently I've been getting lag spikes every time I hope into a game of league. I have no idea what could be the cause of it, all I know is sometimes I can't move my character but I see everyone else move around me. Someone please help me

replies.body:
What you're describing sounds a lot like packet loss or high packet buffering. These issues often occur when there are problematic local network configurations or issues with your ISP routing. I strongly recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step to ensure your local settings are good and aren't conflicting with League. 

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
So I went ahead and ran Netalyzr with the results telling me that there are burst of packet loss. What do I go about telling my ISP so they will know what needs to be fixed?

Packet loss can sometimes be resolved by power cycling your network. You can do this by pulling the power plugs on your modem and router, then plugging them back in after 60 seconds. You'll also want to restart your PC so it can establish a fresh connection to the network. Run another network analysis and see if anything has changed. If it hasn't let me know.
Yeah, I've done that before. And while it may help, it's only for a little while.

In order to find a long-term solution, I recommend reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). If you run a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) and attach them to your request, it will give our techs the context necessary to work with you on a permanent fix.

Let me know if you have any questions!
Finally got around to running HRT and submitting a ticket. Thanks for the info
Lol keep linking that link buddy. Copy pasta much? Doesn't work for anyone. It's your gateway to getting out of a problem.

I've been having the same issue since around patch 6.09. Any commands I put in are ignored and after about 20-30 seconds of this lag everything catches up (usually resulting in my death). I've seen similar posts from years before with no solution...not even an idea to a solution. We're no on patch 6.15, you'd think this would be addressed at least, if not fixed.

My friends are tired of me dropping out after one or two games cause I get so frustrated with this lag. Everything else runs just fine on my computer, ping stays around 40-60 while these spikes happen (INB4 stop downloading porn) If it were so easy, I wouldn't be on the forums.
